149.movie_plot: A waterboy for a college football team discovers he has a unique tackling ability and becomes a member of the team.

154.movie_plot: A security pro finds his past coming back to haunt him, when he and his unique team are tasked with retrieving a particularly important item.

145.movie_plot: In order to inherit his fed up father's hotel empire, an immature and lazy man must repeat grades 1-12 all over again.

177.movie_plot: The world is beset by the appearance of monstrous creatures, but one of them may be the only one who can save humanity.

66.movie_plot: Two minor characters from the play 'Hamlet' stumble around unaware of their scripted lives and unable to deviate from them.

72.movie_plot: An insurance salesman/adjuster discovers his entire life is actually a television show.

56.movie_plot: A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.

132.movie_plot: When a rich woman's ex-husband and a tabloid-type reporter turn up just before her planned remarriage, she begins to learn the truth about herself.

208.movie_name: Honey, I Blew Up the Kid (1992)
208.movie_plot: The Szalinski family is back, this time hilarious disaster strikes when an experiment causes their new toddler son to grow many stories tall.

106.movie_plot: Con artists plan to fleece an eccentric family using an accomplice who claims to be their long-lost uncle.

96.movie_plot: In Canton, Mississippi, a fearless young lawyer and his assistant defend a black man accused of murdering two white men who raped his 10-year-old daughter, inciting violent retribution and revenge from the Ku Klux Klan.

10.movie_plot: When a man goes for virtual vacation memories of the planet Mars, an unexpected and harrowing series of events forces him to go to the planet for real - or does he?

136.movie_name: Back to the Future Part III (1990)

77.movie_plot: A big-city reporter travels to the small town where her mother has been arrested for the murder of an elderly woman that she works for as a maid.

194.movie_plot: The Bradys receive a surprise visit when a man claiming to be Carol's long-lost first husband shows up at their residence, the family question his motives.

75.movie_plot: In late-19th-century Russian high society, St. Petersburg aristocrat Anna Karenina enters into a life-changing affair with the dashing Count Alexei Vronsky.

76.movie_plot: Simple Italian postman learns to love poetry while delivering mail to a famous poet; he uses this to woo local beauty Beatrice.

39.movie_plot: A man tries to rescue a woman with a little help from his half brother.

176.movie_plot: Unless a comet can be destroyed before colliding with Earth, only those allowed into shelters will survive. Which people will survive?

209.movie_plot: Identical twins Annie and Hallie, separated at birth and each raised by one of their biological parents, later discover each other for the first time at summer camp and make a plan to bring their wayward parents back together.

107.movie_plot: The scientist father of a teenage girl and boy accidentally shrinks his and two other neighborhood teens to the size of insects. Now the teens must fight diminutive dangers as the father searches for them.

69.movie_plot: Paulie, a talking parrot, recounts his travels looking for his original owner to a Russian janitor who helps him to the end of his journey.

147.movie_plot: The life and death of the legendary Ludwig van Beethoven. Besides all the work he is known for, the composer once wrote a famous love letter to a nameless beloved, and the movie tries to ...

4.movie_plot: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home world.

58.movie_plot: A middle-aged woman finds herself in the middle of a huge conflict that will either make her a profit or cost her life.

29.movie_plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

162.movie_plot: A joint U.S.-Soviet expedition is sent to Jupiter to learn what happened to the Discovery.

135.movie_name: Back to the Future Part II (1989)
135.movie_plot: After visiting 2015, Marty McFly must repeat his visit to 1955 to prevent disastrous changes to 1985...without interfering with his first trip.

196.movie_plot: As part of a fertility research project, a male scientist agrees to carry a pregnancy in his own body.

1.movie_plot: A misfit ant, looking for "warriors" to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.

193.movie_name: Man Who Knew Too Little, The (1997)

64.movie_plot: Shortly before an election, a spin-doctor and a Hollywood producer join efforts to fabricate a war in order to cover up a Presidential sex scandal.

120.movie_plot: Admiral Kirk and his bridge crew risk their careers stealing the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Spock's body.

104.movie_plot: Lovers' lives are complicated by city law, feuding faerie royalty, and... love.

24.movie_plot: A weatherman finds himself inexplicably living the same day over and over again.

113.movie_plot: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and so restore order to his world.

131.movie_plot: 57 years later, Ellen Ripley is rescued by a deep salvage team during her hypersleep. The moon from the original movie has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, colonial marines have impressive firepower, but will that be enough?

52.movie_plot: A man gets a chance to meet up with his dream girl from high school, even though his date with her back then was a complete disaster.

25.movie_plot: The cruel King Louis XIV of France has a secret twin brother who he keeps imprisoned. Can the twin be substituted for the real king?

156.movie_plot: An absent-minded professor discovers "flubber," a rubber-like super-bouncy substance.

184.movie_plot: Gordon Bombay is forced to withdraw from the minor hockey league with a knee injury. Much to his surprise, he is given the job of coach of Team USA Hockey for the Junior Goodwill Games in ...

19.movie_plot: 200 years after her death, Ellen Ripley is revived as a powerful human/alien hybrid clone who must continue her battle against the aliens. Along with a crew of space pirates, Ripley must also prevent the deadly aliens from reaching Earth.

93.movie_plot: A species of South American killer spider hitches a lift to the U.S. in a coffin and starts to breed and kill.

51.movie_plot: A gentle man, with scissors for hands, is brought into a new community after living in isolation.

3.movie_plot: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazi Germans.

127.movie_plot: A local Pennsylvania band scores a one hit wonder in 1964 and rides the star-making machinery as long as they can, with lots of help from its manager.

95.movie_plot: Bank clerk Stanley Ipkiss is transformed into a manic superhero when he wears a mysterious mask.

21.movie_name: Like Water for Chocolate (Como agua para chocolate) (1992)
21.movie_plot: When tradition prevents her from marrying the man she loves, a young woman discovers she has a unique talent for cooking.

180.movie_plot: "Rambo" parody in which Topper Harley leads a rescue team into Iraq to save Iraqi war prisoners and all of their previous rescue teams.

134.movie_plot: The alumni cast of a space opera television series have to play their roles as the real thing when an alien race needs their help. However, they also have to defend both Earth and the alien race from a reptilian warlord.

124.movie_plot: When a Jamaican sprinter is disqualified from the Olympic Games, he enlists the help of a dishonored coach to start the first Jamaican Bobsled Team.

146.movie_plot: The cross-country adventures of two good-hearted but incredibly stupid friends.

54.movie_plot: In late 1950s New York, Tom Ripley, a young underachiever, is sent to Italy to retrieve Dickie Greenleaf, a rich and spoiled millionaire playboy. But when the errand fails, Ripley takes extreme measures.

101.movie_plot: Two slacker friends try to promote their public-access cable show.

159.movie_plot: A security guard's dreams come true when he is selected to be transformed into a cybernetic police officer.

32.movie_plot: In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr. Zorg at bay.

205.movie_plot: The U.S. President, low in the opinion polls, gets talked into raising his popularity by trying to start a cold war against Canada.

182.movie_name: In the Name of the Father (1993)
182.movie_plot: A man's coerced confession to an IRA bombing he did not commit results in the imprisonment of his father as well. An English lawyer fights to free them.

116.movie_plot: Reunited by the death of a college friend, three divorced women seek revenge on the husbands who left them for younger women.

188.movie_plot: Two dim-witted brothers dream of owning their own dance club or at least getting into the coolest and most exclusive club in town, The Roxbury.

166.movie_plot: A brilliant but eccentric scientist begins to transform into a giant man/fly hybrid after one of his experiments goes horribly wrong.
